solution_line_template: After Smith gave him ${smith_gave}, Randy had {randy_initial_money}+{smith_gave}=<<{randy_initial_money}+{smith_gave}={randy_money_after_smith}>>{randy_money_after_smith} dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is {randy_money_after_smith}-{sally_received}=<<{randy_money_after_smith}-{sally_received}={money_kept}>>{money_kept} dollars.
